Text: you need that trusted skull if you wanna keep posting so much stuff
Congratulations 20/40...it's about time.I hope you will call this your new home.

Thanks, Blue.Sscreen.Of.Death. I was thinkin' that I have stepped on someone's toe with my "small-sized" stuff. I must admit that my number of uploads has been smaller than on name-not-to-be-spoken (I moved-in maybe  two months ago), but it is proportional to number of Thanks, seeders and - oppositely proportional to the number of Hit&Runs, which is enormously high on TPB.
Thanks again. Nice gesture from TPB, my new home.

TRUSTED FINALLY! congrats brotha, and i just had to say cheers for thinking of us aussies and uploading this.... i got the scene release yesterday, great movie, i recommend it to anyone who likes 2040's tastes! 

Once again, congrats on the pink skull my man!
@lilars: I have, my pixelated friend, I have... in few of my first comments here. Thank you too, for support and nice words.

thanx and congr8s bro .. this thing looks cool on yeah hehe .. keep rocking and making our day
loads of blessings tc

Congratualtions 20-40. It's about time you got the 'pink skull'.
I hope this means that the issues about TPB moderators & filing your uploads in the wrong area (due to whatever silly reason they had- bitrate?) has been sorted out.

Well done.
Cheers
Jon

Hi 20-40,
I have a request for one of your re-encodes.
I came across a file claiming to be an extended edition of Sin City.
Would love to get your version but ONLY do it if it is an actual extended verison, as I have seen the original about 10 times at this stage.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5265292/Sin.City.2005.UNRATED.RECUT.EXTENDED.720p.BluRay.x264-CMCT

Cheers
Jon

@Jon: I have what you have asked for, just from trusted source:
Sin.City.2005.Unrated.Recut.Extended.720p.BluRay

But Jon, it is almost 3h long version and I assume re-encoded one will be at least 580 MB.

If you're OK with that, drop me a note.

Congrats on the "SKULL"
Keep Up The Good Work
:)

Hi 20-40,
That is a big size (estimate) but it i smuch better than the 2+GB files I have seen.
So the answer is YES. For Sin City with scenes I haven't seen a most definite yes!

Thanks in advance. I'll seed it as long as possible.

Cheers
Jon

I Just wanted to say thanks for all the great ups you've been putting out lately!

On a side note I want to commend TPB and B.S.O.D  for awarding you with a skull!

u r simply awesome,keep up the good work
